title: Megan Barton Hanson and Chelcee Grimes 'SPLIT'
text:
She recently gushed that she had 'never felt so comfortable' in a relationship.

Yet Megan Barton Hanson and Chelcee Grimes have reportedly split after just six weeks of dating.

The former Love Island contestant, 25, and footballer, 27, are said to both be 'upset' by their separation with the singer apparently busy concentrating on new music.

Happier times: Megan Barton Hanson and Chelcee Grimes have reportedly split after just six weeks of dating (pictured together in September)

A source told The Sun: 'They got on really well and enjoyed a brief romance, but decided to call it a day earlier this week.

'Both were a bit upset about it, but remain pals.

'Chelcee is throwing herself into her music projects and concentrating on recording new tracks at the moment.'

MailOnline has contacted both Megan and Chelcee's representatives for comment.

Unlucky in love: The former Love Island contestant, 25 (pictured), and footballer, 27, are said to both be 'upset' by their separation with the singer apparently busy concentrating on new music

The former couple were last pictured together as they arrived home from a trip to LA earlier this month.

While they visited the Women's Super League trophy in Manchester City's Etihad together last month.

Comparing her relationship with Wes, 21, to with Chelsee, Megan previously told Metro Online: 'It is definitely different [dating girls to guys], my whole life I’ve never really had a relationship with girls, like I said on Celebs Go Dating.

Official: In September, Megan confirmed their relationship, writing on Instagram: 'SO proud to call this absolute babe my GIRLFRIEND,' with a love heart eyes emoji

'And I’ve had, sexual experiences with girls and I’ve had one night stands with girls, but I feel like this is actually me, I’ve never felt so comfortable in my life, I feel like I’m finally where I should be.

'Don’t get me wrong, I was in love with all my exes but this is just a different feeling, like the connection we have.'

In September, Megan confirmed their relationship, writing on Instagram: 'SO proud to call this absolute babe my GIRLFRIEND,' with a love heart eyes emoji.

Ex-lovers: The former couple were last pictured together as they arrived home from a trip to LA earlier this month (Megan, left, and Chelcee, right, pictured in 2011)

It comes after the former stripper's ex-girlfriend Demi Sims, 23, said Megan apologised after their split in August.

The former couple struck up a romance on E4's Celebs Go Dating but later went their separate ways with Megan admitting Demi made her question if she was actually gay or not. She said they had no 'sexual chemistry'.

Speaking exclusively to MailOnline at the Elbrook Cash and Carry Charity Gala Dinner at CHAK 89 in Surrey on Thursday, Demi told how Megan reached out to her on social media to make amends.

'She messaged me last week actually,' Demi said. 'I had her blocked on everything so she reached out to my sister and was like: "Can you tell Demi to unblock me?"

'She was in America at the time with her girlfriend Chelcee [Grimes]. I unblocked her because I wanted to know what she had to say and she kindly apologised for everything she had done.

'She knew she was in the wrong with everything she had done to me. She apologised and we wished each other the best. I was really shocked because I didn’t expect her to ever apologise.

Amends: It comes after the former stripper's ex-girlfriend Demi Sims, 23, said Megan apologised after their split in August (pictured in July 2019)

'It felt really nice and it made my heart warm a bit more. I had a bitter frost towards her because of everything she did to me but when she apologised, it made everything better.'

Demi is single and hasn't dated anyone since she and the Love Island star split.

'I am completely single,' Demi said. 'I’m not dating anyone and I haven’t since Megan on Celebs Go Dating. I’m just waiting to see if anyone is going to surprise me around the corner.'

Although Megan has apologised, Demi doesn't think she will ever be able to be friends with her ex because she may start to develop romantic feelings for her again.

'The thing is, I don’t know if I could ever be her friend because I had too many deep feelings for her,' she said.
description: The former Love Island contestant, 25, and footballer, 27, are said to both be 'upset' by their separation with the singer apparently busy concentrating on new music.
